mapper.select: select nt_code, nt_user,nt_title, nt_vcount,nt_time, from tbl_notice order by nt_code desc
select set nt_code, nt_user,nt_content, nt_vcount,nt_time from tbl_notice left join tbl_image on nt_code = img_concode
select nt_code, nt_title, nt_user, nt_vcount, nt_time from tbl_notice where like nt_title = '%?%' order by nt_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice(nt_code, nt_title, nt_content, nt_writer, nt_date) values(#{nt_code}, #{nt_title}, #{nt_content}, #{nt_writer},#{nt_date});
